Who We Are

Miama Coating Solution is a Ugandan owned company was incorporated in 2008 to provide a refreshingly unique angle, specializing in the provision of creative and innovative ideas to suit our clienteleâ€™s vastly varying needs. Our services are mainly Branding and Signage.

Miama Coating Solution has the much needed technical expertise capable of utilizing the most effective tools and methods to carry out a successful campaign, us being a company with experience in the field of advertising will postively lead you. With a wide scope of social interactive experience.

OUR MOST VALUED KEYS ARE;
